metadata.title: CVE-2021-22226 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Under certain conditions, some users were able to push to protectedbranches that were restricted to deploy keys in GitLab CE/EE since version13.9

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
